meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be washed.
meanings.sent1: The washability of this fabric makes it easy to clean.
meanings.sent2: The washability of the shirt allows it to be laundered without shrinking.
meanings.sent3: I wish my phone had washability so I could clean it easily.
meanings.sent4: The washability of the paint made it simple to remove from the walls.
meanings.sent5: The washability of the marker made it perfect for drawing on whiteboards.

meanings.definition: The ability to withstand washing without damage.
meanings.sent1: The washability of these dishes makes them durable in the dishwasher.
meanings.sent2: The washability of the carpet ensures it can be cleaned without losing color.
meanings.sent3: I wish my shoes had washability so I could toss them in the washing machine.
meanings.sent4: The washability of the car's exterior paint protected it from the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The washability of the blanket allowed it to be washed frequently without wear.
